article.title: Problem showing document

revision.revnumber: Руководство версии 2.8 по апплету списка окон

abstract.para: Список окон позволяет управлять окнами, открытыми в вашей среде GNOME. Каждое окно представлено кнопкой на панели, куда помещен этот апплет.

article.remark: This file has been created when we migrated the window list docs to the User Guide in March 2007.
One day we should remove it completely, say in a couple of release cyles.

sect1.title: Problem showing document
sect1.para:
This document is depreciated, please consult the
Window List help in the GNOME User Guide .

Please take the time to
report a bug . Select the general component of gnome-user-docs and be sure to indicate how you came upon this depreciated document.
